ERROR.BOOKABLE_ITEM_ID_PARAM_NOT_FOUND: This bookable parameter identifier isn't linked with one of your bookable item!
ERROR.DIFFERENT_CURRENCIES: You can not book multiple events that have different payment currencies.
ERROR.MAXIMUM_QUOTA: You can't book more than {{value}} slots
ERROR.MINIMUM_QUOTA: You need to book a minimum of {{value}} slots
ERROR.NO_BOOKABLE_ITEM: Please create at least 1 bookable item in your Sagenda's account!
ERROR.NO_TOKEN: Please copy your authentication code (token) from your Sagenda's account!
ERROR.NUMBER_OF_MEMBERS_EXCEEDS_MAXIMUM: There are not enough openings for the number of members you would like to book.
ERROR.PAYMENT_MODULE_NOT_PAID: The payment module isn't activated anymore, please subscribe from your module center!

MESSAGE.ARE_YOU_SURE_ACTION_CANT_BE_UNDONE: Are you sure? This action can't be undone!
MESSAGE.ARE_YOU_SURE_BLOCK_EVENT: Are you sure you want to block this event? Reservation won't be possible until you unblock the event.
MESSAGE.NO_EVENT: No event found for the given period!
MESSAGE.PLEASE_ENTER_A_VALID_EMAIL_ADDRESS: Please enter a valid email address!
MESSAGE.PLEASE_ENTER_A_VALID_PHONE_NB_WITH_INTER: Please enter a valid phone number with international country code in order to be able to get SMS notifications.
MESSAGE.PLEASE_INDICATE_READ_AGREE_TERMS_AND_CON: Please indicate that you have read and agree to the Terms and Conditions
MESSAGE.WRONG_CREDENTIALS: Wrong login or password. Please create an account if you don't have one.
MESSAGE.YOU_DONT_HAVE_ANY_RESERVATION: You don't have any reservation for that event.
MESSAGE.YOU_WILL_GET_NOTIFICATION: You will soon get a notification by email and optionally by SMS.

MULTIPLE.NO_SELECTED_EVENTS: No event selected. Please click on each event individually or use range selection by selecting several days.

STANDARD.CANCEL_ALL_BOOKINGS_FOR_THIS_EVENT: Cancel all reservations for this event

SUBSCRIPTION.PAYMENT_MESSAGE: You will be redirected to the paypal website to complete your payment and booking
SUBSCRIPTION.TITLE: Title
